pageContext.claim: “We came up with testing, frankly, we test so much that it's almost unfair. You know, when they say 'cases" where 25 million tests and other countries are barely even testing.”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump administration bungled testing in the early stages of the pandemic, allowing the coronavirus to circulate silently in the country, compared to other countries such as South Korea and Germany which tested quickly and thus were able to reduce the spread.
